summary: Adds a cabin perched on the side of a cliff above Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a cabin precariously hanging onto the edge of a rock face, high up in the cliffs above Riverwood. It has excellent views up and down the valley, up to Bleak Falls Barrow, and down to Whiterun. 

It has all the basics an adventurer of any type needs, warriors, mages, thieves. I guess it\'s kind of suited to a hermit, as it is far removed from the general population, with a rickety mountain-side walkway leading up to it. 
_________________________
Installation couldn\'t be easier: Just drop the RiverwoodCabin.esp into your Skyrim/data folder.
To make installation even easier, use the NMM! It\'s awesome!
_________________________
Changelog:

Version 1.0: Added animal furs, changed lighting, moved some stuff around, added fireplace.

BETA: Initial upload.
_______________________
STILL A WORK-IN-PROGRESS! This is my first proper use of the Creation Kit, and the first house I\'ve ever built, and while I\'m proud of what I\'ve done, I\'m aware it still is lacking in a few areas. I will work on them when I have time.

Check out the pictures I\'ve uploaded!
author: LJGB
